outline.title: Amadeo Marketplace
outline.summary: Title slide introducing Amadeo Marketplace: Connecting Local Businesses with Community Customers.

outline.title: The Problem
outline.summary: Local businesses are losing sales to big e-commerce platforms and lack a trusted local marketplace.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/E0QWzbCi7S2D.jpg - Image 2 shows a crowded, traditional local market setting in the Philippines, which visually contrasts with the modern e-commerce platforms mentioned, highlighting the struggle of these local businesses.

outline.title: The Solution
outline.summary: A community-first online marketplace built for Amadeo with free listing and customer incentives.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/AG0HokgNVKK2.jpg - Image 4 is a diagram titled "E Commerce Platform Architecture," which is highly relevant for a slide discussing the technical solution and platform build.

outline.title: Market Opportunity
outline.summary: A massive untapped market in Amadeo with 50,000+ active online shoppers and high growth potential.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/X5j2PAd3Ohxg.png - Image 5 is a chart/graph related to "E-commerce Analysis & Management" and net revenue, which is suitable for a slide discussing market size and financial targets.

outline.title: Business Model
outline.summary: Sustainable revenue model aligned with merchant success, earning 5% on online payments.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/FTTvj9XrOBR8.png - Image 6 is a diagram of the "Key Elements of a Successful E-Commerce Business," which is relevant for explaining the overall business model and strategy.

outline.title: Raffle System
outline.summary: Monthly raffle drives 4X increase in online payment adoption and viral marketing.

outline.title: Competitive Advantage
outline.summary: Unique positioning with local focus, zero friction, community trust, and gamification.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/WtpDxJJQcE80.webp - Image 7 shows a collage of people in a Sari-Sari store setting, representing the local, community-focused business environment that the marketplace aims to serve, contrasting with generic platforms.

outline.title: Early Traction
outline.summary: Proven concept with real merchants, customers, and completed technical milestones.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/hPXvz6gPSQUc.jpeg - Image 8 shows a smiling woman and child in front of a well-stocked local store (Sari-Sari store), which visually represents the "Early Traction" and the type of local business being onboarded.

outline.title: Go-to-Market Strategy
outline.summary: Multi-channel growth strategy to scale merchant and customer acquisition.

outline.title: Partnership Opportunities
outline.summary: Strategic partnerships with municipality, sponsors, logistics, and financial providers.

outline.title: Financial Projections
outline.summary: 3-year plan showing path to profitability and sustainable growth.

outline.title: Team & Execution
outline.summary: Experienced team committed to local commerce with deep community understanding.

outline.title: Ask & Use of Funds
outline.summary: Investment needed to scale, with clear allocation for marketing, support, and tech.

outline.title: Risk Mitigation
outline.summary: Identified key risks and planned mitigation strategies for sustainable success.

outline.title: Call to Action
outline.summary: Join us in building Amadeo's local commerce future - for merchants, partners, and customers.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/DwWnTzueDlBF.jpg - Image 1 shows a busy market with various goods, suitable for a Call to Action to merchants and customers to join the marketplace.

outline.title: Thank You & Q&A
outline.summary: Closing slide with key takeaways and contact information.
